text: Thanks so much @scotgov and @BenMacpherson for this much-needed support for the #CycloneIdai appeal.
author: JamiePolitics

text: A stark warning from Sir David Attenborough: "It may sound frightening, but... if we have not taken dramatic action within the next decade, we could face irreversible damage to the natural world & the collapse of our societies" https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-47666007 … @OxfamScotland @sccscot
author: JamiePolitics

text: Thanks to all the party leaders for supporting this Appeal.
author: JamiePolitics

text: Please support if you can and share this Appeal. Colleagues are responding across the 3 countries hit by #CycloneIdai - including @oxfamMalawi
author: JamiePolitics

text: And yet... tackling #climatechange demands very different kinds of investment... as this banner from last week's school strike says... 'time is ticking' - "BBC News - UK oil and gas industry 'needs £200bn of investment' for future development" https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-scotland-business-47624291 …
author: JamiePolitics

text: It's crucial for the @povinequalscot to become a stretching new platform to tackle #poverty and #inequality in #Scotland. To do so it needs great new members. Please share this message from the Commission's incoming Chair. @OxfamScotland
author: JamiePolitics
